entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Burk's Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:03 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 11:47 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.7°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: -0.3°C
Wind: E 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets mixed with snow changing to rain this afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to a few flurries near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming northwest 30 late this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
